mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN YEAR(create_date) = YEAR(NOW()) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS thisYearRegisterCnt , COUNT(CASE WHEN YEAR(create_date) = YEAR(NOW()) AND MONTH(create_date) = MONTH(NOW()) THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS thisMonthRegisterCnt , COUNT(create_date) AS totalRegisterCnt FROM franchise

SELECT m.months month, COALESCE(revenueByMonth.totalRevenue, 0) revenue FROM (SELECT '01' AS months UNION (SELECT '02') UNION (SELECT '03') UNION (SELECT '04') UNION (SELECT '05') UNION (SELECT '06') UNION (SELECT '07') UNION (SELECT '08') UNION (SELECT '09') UNION (SELECT '10') UNION (SELECT '11') UNION (SELECT '12')) m LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT substr(s.ym, 6,2) months, sum(s.revenue) totalRevenue FROM franchise f INNER JOIN sales s ON f.fra_no = s.fra_no
substr(s.ym,1,4) = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y')
AND f.fra_no = 13
GROUP BY s.ym) revenueByMonth ON revenueByMonth.months = m.months ORDER BY 1

SELECT m.months month, COALESCE(revenueByMonth.totalRevenue, 0) revenue FROM (SELECT '01' AS months UNION (SELECT '02') UNION (SELECT '03') UNION (SELECT '04') UNION (SELECT '05') UNION (SELECT '06') UNION (SELECT '07') UNION (SELECT '08') UNION (SELECT '09') UNION (SELECT '10') UNION (SELECT '11') UNION (SELECT '12')) m LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT substr(s.ym, 6,2) months, sum(s.revenue) totalRevenue FROM franchise f INNER JOIN sales s ON f.fra_no = s.fra_no
substr(s.ym,1,4) = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR), '%Y')
AND f.fra_no = 13
GROUP BY s.ym) revenueByMonth ON revenueByMonth.months = m.months ORDER BY 1
